patthana18.18:4.1: Āsavañceva sāsavañca hetuṃ dhammaṃ paṭicca naāsavo ceva naanāsavo ca nahetu dhammo uppajjati hetupaccayā … tīṇi.
patthana18.18:5.1: Sāsavañceva no ca āsavaṃ hetuṃ dhammaṃ paṭicca naāsavo ceva naanāsavo ca nahetu dhammo uppajjati hetupaccayā … ekaṃ.
patthana18.18:6.1: Āsavañceva sāsavaṃ hetuñca sāsavañceva no ca āsavaṃ hetuñca dhammaṃ paṭicca naāsavo ceva naanāsavo ca nahetu dhammo uppajjati hetupaccayā … ekaṃ.
patthana18.18:6.4: Hetuyā pañca … pe … vipāke ekaṃ … pe … avigate pañca.
patthana18.18:7.1: Āsavañceva sāsavañca nahetuṃ dhammaṃ paṭicca naanāsavo ceva nanoāsavo ca nanahetu dhammo uppajjati hetupaccayā.
